tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an angulated wisdom tooth which had started to barge into my molar and it hurt my entire jaw. 

I visited Dr. Aman on a Saturday. He had an immediate extraction plan. Took an x-ray, showed it to me and asked what I wanted to do. He inquired if I'd like to save it while just filling the cavity or get it removed. I chose the later. So, we started and in about an hour I left with a smile.

The best bits were:
‚Ä¢Minimal pain (I thanked him for it)
‚Ä¢He asked me, during the procedure, if I knew that he had removed the tooth (which I didn't), so I smiled back. 
‚Ä¢I called him at 11:30 p.m. the same day about a concern and he very calmly explained to me what I needed to know.
‚Ä¢No waiting (First visit to him ever; called first).


In a week now, I'm stitches free and pain free.
The only thing you need to worry about is the cost, which depends on the procedure. Since I went under a surgical removal, it cost a bit but looking at the experience I had, it was worth every penny.

I even asked the doc if I could have a copy of my x-ray and he mailed it to me, and even called to confirm if I had received it!

Overall, a brilliant experience of an apparently painful wisdom tooth extraction (which it wasn't; discomfort, sure).

Boy, the doctor has to be good to make you write such a long review!
reply_text: Thanks Mr.Moin.....best review so far ...that too in  so detail...thanks for taking out time for appreciating.

context: Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Sensitive Teeth,Traumatic injuries Dental,Dental Cleaning,Braces Adjustment,
review: It all started in October 2019 with lots of sensitivity in my teeth and also a headache. But it was Dr Dimple and Dr Aman who were so commendable  in detecting the root issue and I am glad that I followed their advice and got my self braces even at the age of 30; I was hesitant  for a while in deciding though, but I am glad I did. It not only had an aesthetic but also cured all my sensitivity  and headache problem and can't appreciate much for their thorough professional work with a very friendly and assuring touch of theirs. Honestly speaking they are actually and only the one dentist specialist on whom I can blindly trust on. I really do not know that whether it is actually correct to say that or not actually but where all the other dentists just keep their original focus not on treatment, there they and their humbleness in treating me actually like their own little daughter is really commendable. A large thank you to themThey have solved all my teeth problems so seamlessly so now it is that I feel that people do not keep praising them just like that.An ideal dentist for me for the method with which they actually cured my tooth issues so early as well as so perfectly, without a single root canal, I feel others may not be able to do the same.Thankfulness is all I want to express to you my dentist.¬†Regards Laxmi
reply_text: Thank you Laxmi for your so kind words. Really appreciate.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Aman is a gr8 well experienced doctor *** ********* ************* ** *** ****** I have been visiting him for last 15 years. I never thought of changing or visiting any other doctor other than him, simply because of his innate ability to treat patients with intensive care and positive dialogue.
He has a state of the art lab with all the modern instruments needed to treat his patients. I consider him one stop shop to treat all my tooth related problems and I would highly recommend everyone to visit his clinic to get all your problems taken care of.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Zirconia Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,
review:
Great experience with the Dr. Aman Arora
I visited Dr. for my root canal therapy zirconia crown and dental fillings . I was bit worried as dealing dental issue to be difficult but the behaviour and calm nature of Dr. during procedure and no pain after root canal. Expecting complete resolution of issue.

The Doctor was very professional and informative. He took proper care of me through out my treatment. He also told me the reason of my problem and how is he treating it. He adviced me on necessary precautions that i need to take care of. The medicines he prescribed were easily available *** **** **** ********** I am thankful to practo as well for providing me such a wonderful doctor. And I would highly recommend Dr. Aman Arora to my friends and family.

review: **** ******* ** ***** Me and my family have full faith in his treatment . We have been his patients since many years. His clinic provides best technology and quality  dental facilities. Fees is also reasonable and worth . Treatments done are long lasting and painless . Thank you for you caring attitude.

I wanted a better smile  so I visited Dr.Arora as I had heard he specializes in Prosthodontic , capping and cosmetic dentistry. He took x-ray to see if my all front teeth were healthy. Then zirconia cappings were done on  my front teeth. Dr is very hardworking and sincere . He values patient satisfaction. I will surely recommend  people for smile improvement to Arora's Dental Clinic.

I visited few dentists earlier, but was not satisfied somehow. My friend referred me to Dr.Aman Arora. I got my  gum treatment done  and some fillings . He is devoted to his profession and  works minutely. ...gud quality work dr. I am satisfied and will refer my close ones.

I came to know through my friend that Dr.Arora specializes in smile improvement.I was not happy with my old caps on my front teeth. Dr.Aman adviced me zirconia crowns.He removed my old caps and gave me a beautiful natural looking smile by zirconia caps. I am happy with my smile  now and very satisfied with the dental treatment.
Mrs Sonu Madan

After my first sitting only, I was so much relieved and was feeling so glad that I made the right decision to go to Dr. Arora. I have had root canal treatments in the past as well but they were quite painful but the way Dr. Arora treated me was really a painless procedure. I would highly recommend Dr. Arora if you are looking for any kind of dental procedure.

review: My teeth were very small since birth. I used to have difficulty in chewing few foods. Dr.Aman Arora is a specialist in smile designing.  He made crowns for almost all of my teeth. I have to praise him for the good work.Will recommend my friends to him.

I went for teeth scaling. Which went fine. Dr Aman Arora also observed that i had 8-9 teeth cavities which need attention and I should get them filled. I trusted him and his guidance. I went on his recommendation and got two cavities filled. I consulted a senior doctor at Maulana Azad Medical College who examined my teeth and advised that these do not need to be filled, it will be unnecessary procedure. I feel cheated now.

Dr.Aman Arora is known for specialising in fixed teeth. I  was having lot of pain in my back tooth.Dr.Arora took an x-ray  and did root canal treatment . I was relieved of pain immediately. I am happy with  his treatment. Cost is reasonable too. Its woth his hard work.

Dr.Aman is a senior doctor and experienced. I had severe pain in my back  side of jaw. Dr.Arora took digital x-ray  and adviced  and explained about root canal. Treatment was done without any much discomfort.It was successful. I am happy. I got teeth fixed by ceramic bridge too. Good work.

Dr.Aman is specialist in teeth replacement and cosmetic dentistry, so I visited him. My one tooth had broken down and had to be extracted . My tooth was replaced bu implant. M very comfortable with the treatment. My tooth looks original. He is a good doctor. I will  recommend.

I could not chew from one side since long and one day it all started with severe pain. Now I can chew properly . Doctor  hand is very good.

My teeth were yellow .I wanted a whiter smile so I visited Arora's Dental Clinic where  they specialize in smile improvement. Doctors did  my teeth whitening by Zoom machine. I had read about it before ...I think its the best. My results were  really commendable . I got a brighter smile.

Visited  Arora's Dental Clinic  at Ashok Vihar as I was having lot of tooth pain. Dr.Aman Arora examined my teeth and took an x-ray .He explained my very well and told that my wisdom toorh was badly decayed and needs to be removed  as it could not be saved.  The tooth was removed ....it was painles...I m satisfied withh the surgery.

My back teeth had to be removed as they were badly broken. The extraction surgery was  comfortable. Implant treatment was done. Doctor gave me back my lost teeth  that too fixed teeth. The cost was reasonable. I am happy with the treatments at Arora Dental Clinic.

We had visited Arora's Dental Clinic for fixed teeth. We met a team of specialists who do implants.Dr. Arora is an experienced doctor. I am happy with my implant treatment.  Doctor is devoted to his profession.Cost was also reasonable. I will recomment to my known people.

review: We didn't found the doctor we took booking for,we were attended by her wife ,she did cleaning of mouth and said nothing will happen but ,there was so much blood after that and my father was heart attack patient so it bacame so difficult for us
reply_text: Dear Mr.Ashpal..Obviously with such a severe case of pyorhoea  bleeding will be there for a while after cleaning . As you are a heart patient ,all the more it is necessary to get your teeth cleaned every year. Its proven that  advanced periodontitis  is one of the causes of heart problems. So our advice still remains the same . Get you teeth cleaned at the earliest from wherever.

The doctors are very knowledgable and experiences and specialize in Cosmetic Dentistry . My front teeth were not in proper shape and were brownish. The doctor made  Zirconia crowns  for my front teeth . Now I can smile confidently with teeth in proper shape and are whiter.

I never liked my smile as my front teeth  had brown spots and were yellow. Doctor Aman did my teeth whitening by ZOOM teeth whitening  machine. It gave amazing results in just half an hour. The doctor is very knowledgable  and caring. After that he did few tooth color filling which matched exactly with my tooth. Great work. Thank you.

The doctors hand is very good . I was given  anaesthesia which was almost painless. Though the treatment took an hour,my root canal treatment was fininshed in one sitting. I thought it would be very painful   as told by my friends.  I am comfortable now. Thank you Doctor.

The doctor is very experienced . I had cavities on my front teeth and they were looking brown . He explained me by pictures and videos , about wat problem I was facing  and made me aware of the consequences.  I got my fillings done with exact shade match. Within an hour  my work was done in  a single sitting.  I appreciate the dental treatment.
Helpfull and guided me well for my dental issues .you may visit and choose according to your need what kind of treatment you required my all over experience were good .
